name: Rain Wept Monster - IGDA Game Jam 2023 (Inspired by Thomas Brush - Neversong)
name_original: Rain Wept Monster - IGDA Game Jam 2023 (Inspired by Thomas Brush - Neversong)
description:
" This is an atmospheric game so please, Head Phone recommended.  "

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Mouse Button to attack

Space to jump

" E to Interact "

Used Asset/Plugins: 

dotween: http://dotween.demigiant.com/

cartoon Vfx: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-remaster-free-109...

Sounds Downloaded from: https://freesound.org/

All other assets were made from scratch with Photoshop.

Rigging & Animations are made in Unity.
